about_the_game:
DLC Girls 001 Lena-Ryar



A lady who works for a famous major corporation as the CEO’s personal secretary.
She is very close with her stepsister Michelle Ryar yet is unaware her sister is a sniper and an assassin.
She is so competent she was singled out to work as the CEO's secretary when she was at a young age.
With her capable, arrogant and elegant look she is recognized like a mascot.
However, everything is a mask for her to be in complete disguise from the company. In real life,
she likes to upload sleazy cosplay photos of herself to her SNS account and is much closer to being a playful little devil and enjoys seeing
the comments from men caught up in the act. Lena was the one to introduce her stepsister Michelle into the world of cosplay.
Unlike Michelle, she is lady secretary who is from Asian descent, which gives her the black hair and orange twinkling eyes.
She has a pretty face and body where what should be out is out and what should be in should be in, which makes her the devil’s peak,
causing a lot of jealousy and admiration at the same time amongst other women. …
However, she is twisted inside and enjoys teasing men. What she likes is sex. What she does not like are innocent sincere men and first timers.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not suitable for all ages or may be inappropriate for use at work place : nudity or sexual suggestive content of 2D anime-style characters

All characters involved in game contents are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
DLC Girls 001 Lena-Ryar



A lady who works for a famous major corporation as the CEO’s personal secretary.
She is very close with her stepsister Michelle Ryar yet is unaware her sister is a sniper and an assassin.
She is so competent she was singled out to work as the CEO's secretary when she was at a young age.
With her capable, arrogant and elegant look she is recognized like a mascot.
However, everything is a mask for her to be in complete disguise from the company. In real life,
she likes to upload sleazy cosplay photos of herself to her SNS account and is much closer to being a playful little devil and enjoys seeing
the comments from men caught up in the act. Lena was the one to introduce her stepsister Michelle into the world of cosplay.
Unlike Michelle, she is lady secretary who is from Asian descent, which gives her the black hair and orange twinkling eyes.
She has a pretty face and body where what should be out is out and what should be in should be in, which makes her the devil’s peak,
causing a lot of jealousy and admiration at the same time amongst other women. …
However, she is twisted inside and enjoys teasing men. What she likes is sex. What she does not like are innocent sincere men and first timers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.12 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphic card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
